First-class
Innovative Intellectual
Non-Governmental
Organization

An Advocate for law and justice sector reform and we provide access to justice for all.

Our Legal Services

Who we are

Law Hub Development and Advocacy Centre is an independent, non-governmental and non-profit law, justice and development-focused organization.

More About Us

0 +
Impact Made

0 +
Happy Clients

0 +
Legal Associates

Our Legal Services

Innovation And Client-Focused Practice Areas

Legal & Policy Reform Advocacy

LACE engages in legal and policy reform advocacy based on established facts and objective analysis, grounded in concrete proposals
Read More

Capacity Building & Training

LACE executes projects to assist organizations by designing effective strategies and emerging tools which in turn will facilitate better performance internally and in their outputs.
Read More

Public Education Campaigns & Awareness-raising

LACE conducts trainings for relevant institutions, organize awareness-raising activities, and provide platforms for public debate, by organizing conferences, seminars and roundtables among others.
Read More

Research & Documentation​

LACE regularly carries out research to identify, document and raise awareness about the knowledge gaps in the execution of relevant legislative frameworks.
Read More

Consulting & Technical Services ​

LACE offers consulting and technical services which focus on most critical issues and opportunities within the scope of our thematic areas
Read More
